column2: Reform the Carthaginian Empire
After the destruction of Carthage, we have come back stronger as ever and it is time to reform our old Punic glory by proclaiming our once lost empire.
Craft Dragon Artifacts
This Dragon Skeleton has been rotting in my throne room for far too long, maybe there is better use to them. Perhaps as weapons or armor...
Rename your Dragon
As we have tamed this dragon, we could give it a name that suits better.
Ride your Dragon

Ever since you brought your dragon back, it has not been doing much except sitting and waiting. Dragons need to be active to be healthy, perhaps you could attempt riding it to see how much it trust you and to perhaps use it in wars to come.
Unite the Arabian Tribes

After many struggles against our neighbours and against the Western Roman Empire, we have finally united all of the tribes of Germania instead to have a stronger front against the Eastern Roman Empire
Establish Tributary from Vassal
Our realm has been hard to govern recently, perhaps if we grant some of our vassals independence while still paying us tribute, maybe this could help us easen our administration.
Revive West Rome
After the fall of Rome, it is left to us Romans to restore our once mighty empire. Now is the time to tell our people of our glory and proclaim the Western Roman Empire once more.
Form the Frankish Kingdom
As we have beaten our enemies like the Romans, we have established our people in the lands of Gaul. Now it is time to proclaim our Kingdom within these lands for the Franks.
Unite the Germanic Tribes

After many struggles against our neighbours and against the Western Roman Empire, we have finally united all of the tribes of Germania instead to have a stronger front against the Western Roman Empire
Recover the Roman Coin Value

For many years, the value of the Roman Coin and its quallity has dropped dramaticly from its details and the amount of silver to a coin being reduced to nothing more than a thin sheet of metal. We have to restart our economy and make our coins valuable again.
Stabilize Roman Bureaucracy

For a while, the people of Rome has turned corrupt. Our officials and nobility are not to be trusted, they are hoarding all the riches and will be the downfall of our empire. Now is the time to set things strat and put an end to this hypergreed of theirs.
Reform the Roman Legions

Our armies consist of mostly mercenaries and barbarians, we no longer live in the time where our legions are fully consistant or mostly of pure Romans. It could also be very uncomfortable to have these Germans arround, who knows when they will betray us. This is why we must act fast and reform our army so that we are not affraid of our armies anymore and that we can rely and trust them.
Stabilize West Rome

After our reforms, it seems as things are turning for the best. The Western Roman Empire is thriving and healthy as ever, this is the time to assert our dominance again for a ever lasting Rome for the ages to come.
Abandon Britania
Britania has been a difficult province to manage however, as we are slowly losing grip on the empire. Perhaps we could make it easier for us by abandoning Britania so we can focus on the mainland.
Build a Roman Bathhouse
As a Roman, being clean is important in our society. Besides cleanliness, it was also a place to be together, therefore it would be smart to build a bathhouse.
Claim Rome
As the Roman [Root.GetTitle], the Eternal City should be yours to rule.
Restore Constantinople

For a long time, we have saved our gold and have made a full preperated plan to restore the City of the World's Desire. We will restore the former glory of the city and resolve the problems that has been plauging the city for ever so long!
Raise the Army of the Order
War is uppon us, it is time to call upon the army of the Military Order.
Form Prussia
After asserting our control on the Gulf of Danzig and solidifying our place in Pommerania, it is perhaps time as Prussians to form the Kingdom of Prussia.
Found a Military Order
The ways of Feudalism is not working out for us, perhaps we should turn more Militaristic with a goal in mind, instead of mindlessly ruling over a realm. It is time we form a Military Order.
Request Imperial Forces
As a Province to the Empire of China, you have the right to request some regiments of the Imperial Army of China to help you defend.
Delcare First Ilkhanate War
Delcare First Ilkhanate War
Delcare First Golden Hordic War
Delcare First Golden Hordic War
Delcare First Timurid War
Delcare First Timurid War
Delcare First Mongol War
Delcare First Mongol War
Tributize Mongol States
Now that we have divided the lands of the former Great Khan, it is time for the my brothers to hold up their end of the promise and have them under my command
Siphon Mercenary Gold
We need some more gold and it seems that our mercenary band still has some left, perhaps we could take some of their gold for ourself.
Develop County Economy
Having an influx of Gold is good but too much might not be smart. Perhaps its a good idea to reinvest this Gold into this county for some economic benifits
Develop County Military
Having an influx of Gold is good but too much might not be smart. Perhaps its a good idea to reinvest this Gold into this county for some military benifits
Force Peasants to War
The peasants are just a mere being to exsist only for sacrafice to the Gods, perhaps we could kill them off by forcing them to go fight our war.
Become Merchant Republic
Become Merchant Republic
Vassalize Mercenary Band
It has come to our attention that our enemies are also hiring the Mercenary Band we have created. Perhaps it is time to privatize our Mercenaries and vassalize them so they only serve us
Restore Ostrogothic Italy

This is it, we have finally returned to the land we have once conquered from the fallen Roman Empire. It is time to be proclaimed the King of the Romans and Ostrogoths again and restore order in our new Italy
Restore Visigothic Hispania
This is it, we have finally returned to the land we have once conquered from the fallen Roman Empire. It is time to be proclaimed the rulers of Hispania again and restore order in our new Hispania
Reform the Western Roman Empire

The title of Western Rome has been destroyed for a long time now after the cowardice split Eastern Roman Empire, the West being conquered by the Germanic Barbarians. However, after many victories and gathering the ancient people of Rome. It is time to proclaim the title of Western Roman Emperor!
Reform the Roman Republic

The title of Western Rome has been destroyed for a long time now after the cowardice split Eastern Roman Empire, the West being conquered by the Germanic Barbarians. However, after many victories and gathering the ancient people of Rome. It is time to reform the Roman Republic and restore our democracy!
Integrate Bohemia
Now that we have Bohemia under our control, we can finally start integrating our old Slavic brother into the Commonwealth
Recreate The Legion of Italica
As we Resotred the §YWestern Roman Empire§!, we will need to create a Legion again. It is time to recreate Rome's finest army
Demand the Dissolution of the Holy Roman Empire
Another Envoy will be sent but this time to the §YHoly Roman Empire§! to demand that the Emperor destroys the title of §YHoly Roman Empire§!
Unite the Roman Eagles
Now that we have reformed and reestablished the Western Roman Empire, it is time to pay a visit to the §YEastern Roman Empire§! to perhaps reunite diplomaticly or trough war
Create the Mongol State of Russia

The Russian lands seems to be too challenging to govern my ourselfs as we have better things to do than to stay in Russia. Perhaps its wise to release a loyal Russian Mongol State that will answer our every call in case we need the extra men
Restore Timur's Legacy

After the horrible defeat against the Qara Qoyunlu, our father's realm has been shatters in pieces where my brothers had control over a certain kingdom, but no more. Since i have reunited my father's empire, it is time for me to Reunify the Timurid Empire under my administration
Unify all of Islam
The time of Islamic Unification has come, unite your people and consolidate your power as Caliph of the Islamic World!
Mend the Islamic Schism

Since the death of Muhammed, Islam has been divided into many warring sects, each claiming to be a rightful continuation of Muhammed's Caliphate, if I were to unite them under Shia Islam. I could proclaim myself the true heir of the Caliphate, ending this Schism once and for all!
Embrace Emir Timur's Ambition
column6: Convertido en el mÃ¡s grande de los kanes

column2: A Turco-Mongol ruler who manages to gather support for his cause to reconquer the Mongol Empire.
Destroy Great Work
§RWARNING: This Great Work cannot be restored and will be permanently removed§!
Add Holding to County
By investing a large sum of money you're allowed to increase the province's holding slot amount.
Invite Diplomat
Invite a random diplomat from your realm to come work at your court.
Invite Spy
Invite a random spy from your realm to come work at your court.
Embrace Anglo-Norse
Embrace the Anglo-Norse culture. Anglo-Norse is a cultural mix between the Saxons and the Norse.
Form the Hanseactic League

By alligning ourselves with all the cities and boroughs along the North Sea and the Baltic Sea we will able to establish a strong merchant league able to protect itself without the help of foreign lords or lieges.
Not today!(PICK THIS OPTION TO STAY ALIVE)
Pick this option if you want a to have a 100% chance on living. This will not give you the "Gift of Death" modifier!
Pick Zoroastrian Devotion
Pick the devotion you want to have with you during your lifetime in this world
Build a Fire Shirne
As a Order Member, it is important to get ever so close to Ahura Mazda and be more dedicated to the true faith. Perhaps building a small shrine will draw us ever so close.
Celebrate Gahs
One of the important requirements to be a true Zoroastrian follower is to celebrate festivals and other celebrations, one of the most important ones being Gahs. It is time to celebrate Gahs.
Summon Immortal Commander
We are in need of new commanders that can help our army being led. Perhaps we could look at some retired Veteran Immortals that want to get back into combat or just to lead.
Create the Zoroastrian Avesta
After many decades, we have finally found all the pages that were missing and scattered. It is time to create a book that has all the holy Zoroastrian Texts complete.
Attempt to find Zoroastrian Pages

Since we have a rank higher than the usual Order members, we are allowed by the Mowbadan-Mowbad to gather a group of Order members and use them to try finding these mythical pages that are lost to our religion, decades ago.
Destroy this Settlement
§RWARNING:This will remove this Castle/City/Temple giving you a emply Bulding Slot. This will give you a severe debuff on the province which will stack if destroying multiple settlements at once§!.
Destroy military buildings
§RWARNING:This will destroy all buildings that provide base troops. (Only exception are province-unique buildings)§!.
Call the Peasants to Arms
Desperate times call for desperate measures, we will not give up this easy. We will call in the peasantry as our final line of defense or offence.
Unite all of India
We have finally brought the whole of India under our rule after many struggles and hardships, spread the word that India at last is united!
Declare the Indian Crusade
Study the Quran
In order to become more pious I must indulgde myself in the word of Allah (The Greatest).
Pick Learning Trait
Choose from 3 different learning lifestyle traits and gain knowledge on your way to achieving that lifestyle.
Negotiate Decadence
Negotiate the decadent ways of [Root.GetName] and turn him back to the ways of Allah.
Invite Imam
Invite a wise Imam from the society come aid you at your court.
Remove the Carolingian Influences

The influences of the Carolingians forced onto the people of Germania shall be undone! The tribes of Franconia, Swabia, Saxony, Thuringia will be split back into their original territories, no longer chained together by the Carolingian ideas that had fused them together. Together we can rebuild Germania in a new light!
Conquer the Isles of the West

The viking longships have made many voyages to the British Isles and have tried to set up permanent residence in York, however the proper lands of England still lay untapped at large. We must conquer the Kingdom of England in our name!
Claim the Kingdom of England
With turmoil rising in England and a claimant already on their way to dispute the current holder of the thrown, I can put together a good amount of evidence to support my own claim.
Use Dragon in Battle
We have better use for our dragon, bring it close to the battlefield.
Use Dragon in Siege
We have better use for our dragon, bring it to the siege.
Resolve the Abbasidian Administration
Expel Corrupt Abbasid and Turkish Officials
Reorganize the Abbasid Levies
After many attemps, we have finally found a sollution to the Administrative problems within the Umayyads. Now is the time to finalize our sollution

These Officials have been the core of the Corruption within the Abbasids. Now that everything is under our control proper, it is time to expell these officials and impelent a new sytstem within our court, so that we will never have this problem again

It took a while but we have finally restructered the army and brought order and hope to our men. No longer are they plauged constant instability by many rivals within the Middle East. It is finally time to Restore Order within the Abbasids
Conclude Abbasid Crisis
It is finally time to put an end to all of our problems and declare that our realm has been stabalized
Resolve the Umayyadian Administration
Expel Corrupt Umayyad Officials
Reorganize the Umayyad Levies
After many attemps, we have finally found a sollution to the Administrative problems within the Umayyads. Now is the time to finalize our sollution

These Officials have been the core of the Corruption within the Umayyads. Now that everything is under our control proper, it is time to expell these officials and impelent a new sytstem within our court, so that we will never have this problem again

It took a while but we have finally restructered the army and brought order and hope to our men. No longer are they plauged by the humuliation in Francia. It is finally time to Restore Order within the Umayyads
Conclude Umayyadian Crisis
It is finally time to put an end to all of our problems and declare that our realm has been stabalized
Resolve Imperial Administration
Restore Imperial Diplomacy
Reform the Imperial Army
Appease the Imperial Clergy
It is finally the time to resolve the issue of the Administration of our vast Empire and let our subjects know who rules these lands
Despite our size, we have to set our place in Europe. It is time to restore the trust of Europe with our presence
After many attempts, it is finaly time to finish the disaray with our army and restore order within the Holy Roman Empire
Not only the nobility was against us but also the Clergy within these lands. However it is now time to satisfy the Clergy and let them know what we are Louis the Pious's Successor
Finalize the Imperial Crisis

It took alot of time and effort, but it is worth it at the end. We have finally stabalized the Holy Roman Empire and regained control over our vassals and our army. It is now time to finalize this crisis at once!
Adopt Russian Bureaucracy
Ruling over so many cultures and religions sure is a big task, however we can make administrating the Empire easier by reforming our bureaucracy
Enact Russia's Destiny
As we have stabilized and strengthened the Empire, perhaps it is time to expand eastwards untill the end of the world and beyond!
Grant Republican Boon
Expand the infrastructure of this province by giving them extra fundings and boons which is able thanks to the Republic Administration
Convert Heretic County
Convert this Province which does not follow the true faith
Grant Theocratic Blessing
Bless and teach this character to be a better person
Reorganize into Feudalism
The time of Theocracies and Republics are over for our nation, it is time to convert our administration to Feudalism
Choose a Chinese Commander Trait
Since we like to follow spiritual traditions, we will have to pick our way to an animal
Pick Orthodox Icon
Pick the icon you want to have with you during your lifetime in this world
Dismantle the Holy Roman Empire

It is time to make an end for the Holy Roman Dominance on Europe. We have to take this title away from them by destroying the Holy Roman Empire. This way we will be the one and only dominant force in Europe and nothing will then stop us!
Establish a new Holding
Since we are prosperous enough and have the coinage, we are able to expand our holding with one building slot!
Reform into the Empire of God

At last we have solidified our possition into Italy. Now that that Italy belongs to the Holy See, we shall finally declare ourself title holder and Key to the Empire of God. The world must know of this!
Appoint Papal Cardinal
Appoint a Cardinal for the Papacy
Appoint Papal Cardinal
Appoint a Cardinal for the Papacy
Unite the Christian Churches
Now that you have gained control over our holy cities again, it is time to end the schism between the Orthodox Church and the Roman Church that has seperated us for far too long.
Ask for Papal Blessing
Request a Papal Blessing from the Pope
Request Papal Investiture
As the Pope, you can ask rulers to change their law to Papal Investiture
Unite the Celtic Kingdoms

For many generations, our people have been oppressed and have been bannished from Europe by the Roman Empire but no longer will we stand for this. After the pathetic Roman Empire fell, we finally have a chance to reunite our people and proclaim the Celtic Empire!
Unite the Celtic Cultures
Now that Celitc Empire has been formed, we also have to truly unite our Celtic brothers back to our old roots, the ancient Celtic culture.
Embrace the Ancient Celtic Culture
A glorious time to be alive with our fellow Celtic brothers, however it is time to go back to our old roots and embrace the culture that has been followed by our ancestors.
Send Celtic Ultimatum to the Papacy

After our Reconquest of Gaul we finally arived at the land of the Holy See. It is time to make the Papacy pay for igoring the Celtics for many decades, we shall send an Diplomat towards Rome to issue our Ultimatum.
We will send an diplomat towards the §YPapacy§! to issue our demands towards the Pope
Establish the North Sea Empire
It is finally time to unite our people with the people of England and proclaim the North Sea Empire
Establish the Varingian Empire
Finally, we have reconnected with our ancestors that migrated to the Russian land. Now we will form the Varingian in honor of our grandfathers in Russia
Prepare the Invasion on France

The French always were a rival to us and always needed to be dealt with. Now that we have grown strong and might with the North Sea Empire. Perhaps it is time to take a vist to Paris and burn the French Kingom to the ground!
Prepare the Invasion to destroy Byzantium

Many of us are currently serving the Byzantines, however this should and will not be tollerated anymore. It is time to take revenge on the Byzantines for this humulliation and for the mistake that our ancesors have brought. We shall burn the Empire of the Romans to the ground and destory all of its glory!
Establish a Nordic Colony

It seems that the land we just conquered are in need of more direct Administration, perhaps if we establish a Nordic Colony here by assigning a vassal to this land and releasing it out of our domain, that the land here will be built up and repaired faster.
Integrate the Nordic Colony
It seems that the Colony has been setting up the land here properly gettin rid of any Administrative issues, perhaps it is time to reintegrate our colony back to our empire for more direct control
Unite the Lowlands
The time for Dutch Independence and has come at last. Unite the lowlands and ask the people who they want as ruler!
Implement Dutch Infrastructure
Expanded Dutch Infrastructure

The Dutch always are looking to improve and expand their land. The biggest reason being to make the swamplands of the Dutch more expandable. Since the Dutch have a small portion of land, they also used their building strategies to improve and expand upon the limited land they have.

The Dutch always are looking to improve and expand their land. The biggest reason being to make the swamplands of the Dutch more expandable. Since the Dutch have a small portion of land, they also used their building strategies to improve and expand upon the limited land they have.
Restore Order in England
After much effort and enduring invaders and raiders alike. We have finally restored order in England and united its people. Now is the time to declare this Unification over all of Europe
Establish the Latin Empire
If the old Byzantine Heartland is under my control, I can effectively destroy these pretenders and crown myself ruler of the Latin Empire with the blessing of the Pope!
Establish the Holy Roman Empire

At last, we now have conquered the Kingdom of Italy after we have unified the Germans under the Kingdom of Germany. However, we are ruiling over too many people now, it is time to declare something that has been failed in the past. We shall now proclaim the Holy Roman Empire. We are the Successors of the Roman Empire!
Unify Germania
It took us a big while, but at last. We have united the German people trough Blood and Iron. Now it is time to declare it trough out the whole of Europe
Scorched Earth
This Province has been razed to the ground by the ruler of these lands. This seems to be a desperate last measure that the ruler took
Reinforce this Province

You can force your people living in this province to fight for you in which the province will suffer from.§RWARNING: Using this button gives your province negative modifiers for some time. Use it at your own risk as a last resort§!
Hoist the Black Flag
I have had it with Feudal Governance. Perhaps it is time to be more adventurous and start a Pirate Republic.
Establish Pirate Port
In order to mark this land ours, it is perhaps smart to establish our Pirate Port here
Hire Experienced Pirate
Mobilze Pirates
Convert Prestige to Gold
As a pirate, should convert our useless prestige to gold
Convert Piety to Gold
As a pirate, should convert our useless piety to gold
Recently converted gold
Sell Prisoner to Slavery
This Prisoner has been with us for a while and we cant do something with them. Perhaps if we sell them to slavery that we can at least get something in return
Recently sold Slaves
Ask Pirates to join Wars
Pirates are not only raiders and plunderers, they can also be hired as Mercenaries. Perhaps it is smart to bribe them into our current conflicts
Train to become Pirate Commander
Now that you are a pirate, it is perhaps smart to learn the ways of the pirates by becoming a Pirate Commander
Convert to Military Order

As a Military Order, we have to establish more bases of operation within these teritories, hence why we could turn this vassal into a Military Order too. This could be handy so that we can call them into our wars directly and assert more control over the area.
Convert to Pirate Republic
In order for our Piracy influence to expand, we could turn this vassal into a Pirate Republic too. This could be handy so that we can call them into our wars directly
Established a Pirate Republic
Established a Order
City of the World's Desire

Constantinople is truly the beauty of the world, the new capital of the Eastern Roman Empire. Yet, with a desire comes a cost. Hence why the city is struggling with problems like overpopulation, maintenence problems, taxation inefficiency and the population not wanting to get recruited into the army since they wouldnt want to sacrafice their life and miss the experience of living in this beautifull city
Convert Piety to Prestige
If you need some Prestige, you can trade in some of your Piety to get extra Prestige
Convert Prestige to Piety
If you need some Piety, you can trade in some of your Prestige to get extra Piety
Create Cadet Branch
Your character creates a cadet branch of your dynasty. WARNING: This makes your dynasty much smaller
Implement Open Elections
Implement Open Elections
Prestige/Piety Conversion Cooldown
Becoming a Pious or a Prestigious person can be hard to achieve. This left you stressed and you figure to take a small break
Study Burnout
This character has currently studied too hard in the Library
You must not be over your Demesne Size
Visit Library
Since we are in need of some Technological Advancements, maybe it is not a bad idea to study some books to find the answers
Unrival Character
Enough is enough, it is time to talk this out and put an end to this pointless Rivalry..
Irritation from Unrivaling
Talking it out with someone can be annoying sometimes as perhaps it was their fault, you suck it up anyhow yet it leaves you irritated

What a suprise, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived in my throne room with his envoy to talk about if perhaps we can rest our rivalry and let go our reasons of this rivalry as well as your issues with your other rivals.
Perhaps, i just need to forgive and forget...
I cannot forgive you all!
As we have visited our old friend to stop our rivalry, we unfortunatly got rejected as his hate is still too strong to let go yet
Unfortunate..
Grealy Improved Opinion
Greatly Improve Opinion
Our Diplomats are taking way too long to improve their opinion of ours, maybe its best to do it ourselfs..
Social Exhaustion
Talking with someone for a while can be exhausting and left u tired when you came back from your visit
Lower Threat
It seems that our bordering realms are intimidated by our rapid expansion, we need to perhaps increase our Diplomatic efforts by keeping them calm and having them on our side
Lowering Threat
This Character is currently increasing their Diplomacy to lower their threat that is being seen by many bordering realms
Invite Characters
We are in need of new courtiers.Perhaps we can invite a selection of recruitable characters. From Nobleman to Scholars to even Marshals.
Invite Great Characters
We are in need of new courtiers and not just any, we need the very best. Perhaps we can invite a selection of recruitable characters. From Nobleman to Scholars to even Marshals.
Invite Great Diplomat
Promote a great soldier from the officer ranks of your army to lead the troops on the battlefield.
Invite Great Commander
Promote a great soldier from the officer ranks of your army to lead the troops on the battlefield.
Invite Great Commander
Promote a great soldier from the officer ranks of your army to lead the troops on the battlefield.
Invite Exalted Holy Man
Scour the land for a holy woman to join my court and advise me on religious matters.
Invite Exalted Holy Woman
Scour the land for a holy woman to join my court and advise me on religious matters.
Invite Great Noble to Court
Invite a briliant nobleman to court, to aid with matters of administration.
Invite Great Noble Woman to Court
Invite a briliant noblewoman to court, to aid with matters of administration.
Present Beautifull Débutante
A young beautifull noblewoman who has caught not only your eye, but the eyes of many which makes her début at a formal ball.
Cancel Inviting Great Character
Perhaps, it is too early to recruit a new character just yet..
Cancel Inviting Character
Perhaps, it is too early to recruit a new character just yet..
Demobilize Realm
We are in need of new inventions and in general for our people to be smarter, this is why we can choose to ignore our military and financial effort to pursuit techonogly
Remobilize Realm
Danger is looming again, its best to mobilize our realm again and prepare our army for the worst
Demobilized Realm
Technological Efforts
Remobilizing Realm
Help Tribe Feudalize
Tribes can be stuck to their traditions and not develop whatsoever, perhaps as ruler, you could lend them a hand by Feudalizing the lands of the Tribe for the Chief for a small cost.
Recently Feudalized a Tribe
Feudalizing a Tribe can be exhausting and costly, you figure to take a break from it.
Cancel your Travel
You have come to the realisation that you are lost and dont know where you are, and decided to turn back home
Cancel your Kowtow
Traveling to the Imperial Palace of China can be difficult as it seems that you are lost while traveling, perhaps its smart to return home and instead sent an experienced envoy to China
